name: NanoVirus
description:
NanoVirus Story

This game is a 2D top down shooter. The game takes place in a computer world where a player is an anti-virus right out of university and wants to prove it self. The player will fight a specific virus on each level and need to learn its weaknesses and advantages to overcome it.

This game was developed apart of a major project at SAE Qantm Creative Institute by six Game Designers.

Developers

Peter Liang - Project Manager

Timothy Threlfo - Programmer/Q.A

J'Jay Yabsley - Gameplay Programmer

Steven Pascoe - Technical Designer

Richard Spiegel - Creative Lead

Jason Spiegel - Lead Artist
